name: Little Steps
description:
In order to take on the bigger things in life, one must start with the small, taking things in little steps...

A game about the struggles one can have in overcoming obstacles, both physical and mental on an ordinary day, and how our direct atmosphere can affect us. The player must tend to and interact with the environment around them in order to improve their state of mind and have enough energy to step out into the world.

A project by Dream Team for The Women in Games Jam 2021 with the theme Atmosphere

Dream Team is an Australian four member team of participants consisting of:

  • Amanda Parks | Programming & Tech Art
  • Jane Wei | Music & Sound Design 
  • Samantha Handley | 3D Art & 2D Art 
  • Harley Brown | Narrative Design, Script Writing, Voice Acting & 2D Art

Check-List 4 Today:

  • Turn on the lava lamp
  • Empty the old pizza box
  • Eat some breakfast
  • Let some sunlight in
  • Water the cactus
  • Hang up fairy lights
  • Put trash in the bin
  • Put away clothes basket
  • Deal w clothes on chair
  • Pick up clothes on floor
  • Hang up the posters
  • Put on fresh T-Shirt
  • Stick Glow-in-dark stars
  • Crack open window 4 air
  • Make the bed
  • Put on pants!

How To Play 

Move: W A S D

Look around: MOUSE

Examine/Close Text: E 

Play / Change music: SPACE 

Admin Controls: Arrows
